stateDiagram

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

System_Initialization

System_Initialization : System_Initialization

System_Initialization : enter / #123; system_init_enter()#59; #125;

Adc_Calibration

Adc_Calibration : Adc_Calibration

Adc_Calibration : enter / #123; adc_calibration_enter()#59; #125;

Adc_Calibration : do / #123; adc_calibration_do()#59; #125;

state System_Run {

        %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
        %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
        state "." as System_Run.(InitialState)

        Standby

        Standby : Standby

        Standby : enter / #123; system_pause_enter()#59; #125;

        Standby : exit / #123; system_pause_exit()#59; #125;

        state Electricity_Control_Mode {

                %% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
                %% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
                state "." as Electricity_Control_Mode.(InitialState)

                Initialization_Of_Pid

                Initialization_Of_Pid : Initialization_Of_Pid

                Initialization_Of_Pid : enter / #123; pid_init_enter()#59; #125;

                Electricity_Control

                Electricity_Control : Electricity_Control

                Electricity_Control : enter / #123; current_control_enter()#59; #125;

                Electricity_Control : do / #123; current_control_do()#59; #125;

                Electricity_Control : exit / #123; current_control_exit()#59; #125;

                Parameter_Adjustments

                Parameter_Adjustments : Parameter_Adjustments

                Parameter_Adjustments : enter / #123; parameter_adjust_enter()#59; #125;

                Change_Of_Objective

                Change_Of_Objective : Change_Of_Objective

                Change_Of_Objective : enter / #123; target_change_enter()#59; #125;

        }

}

System_Error

System_Error : System_Error

System_Error : enter / #123; system_error_enter()#59; #125;

System_Error : exit / #123; system_error_exit()#59; #125;

System_Stop

System_Stop : System_Stop

System_Stop : enter / #123; system_stop_enter()#59; #125;

System_Stop : do / #123; system_stop_do()#59; #125;

ROOT.(InitialState) --> System_Initialization

System_Initialization --> Adc_Calibration : do

Adc_Calibration --> System_Run : adc_calibration_complete

Adc_Calibration --> System_Error : calibration_failed

System_Run --> System_Error : control_anomaly

System_Run --> System_Stop : stop_the_request

System_Run.(InitialState) --> Standby

Standby --> Electricity_Control_Mode : power_control

Electricity_Control_Mode --> Standby : get_on_standby

Electricity_Control_Mode.(InitialState) --> Initialization_Of_Pid

Initialization_Of_Pid --> Electricity_Control : do

Electricity_Control --> Parameter_Adjustments : needed_referral

Electricity_Control --> Change_Of_Objective : target_current_change

Parameter_Adjustments --> Electricity_Control : do

Change_Of_Objective --> Electricity_Control : do
